title: Premium redesign: Lucide icons, multi-accent palette, glassmorphism+gradient luxury aesthetic

requirements.summary: Replace all emoji icons with contextually appropriate Lucide React SVG icons sized at 20–24px across Quick Access, Mess Menu, Events, Notices, Navbar, BottomPanel, and Modal
acceptanceCriteria: No emoji characters appear anywhere in the rendered UI
All icons are Lucide React SVG components
Icons are consistently sized at 20–24px across all sections
Icons are contextually relevant to their card/section labels

file_operations.description: Add lucide-react package as a dependency for SVG icon components

Replace emoji icons with Lucide icons: CalendarDays for Timetable, CheckSquare for Attendance, BookOpen for Library, Coffee for Canteen, MapPin for Map, Info for Help. Import from lucide-react and set size to 20–24px. Remove all emoji strings from tile data.
Replace emoji meal icons with Lucide icons: Coffee for Breakfast, UtensilsCrossed for Lunch, Moon for Dinner. Import from lucide-react and set size to 20–24px. Remove all emoji strings.
Replace emoji event icons with Lucide Zap icon for all events. Import from lucide-react and set size to 20–24px. Remove all emoji strings from event data.
Replace emoji notice icons with Lucide Bell icon for all notices. Import from lucide-react and set size to 20–24px. Remove all emoji strings from notice data.
Replace hamburger emoji/text with Lucide Menu icon styled with emerald colour (#4a9e6a). Import from lucide-react and set size to 24px. Remove any emoji strings.
Replace close button emoji/text with Lucide X icon in emerald colour. Import from lucide-react and set size to 20px.
Replace close button emoji/text with Lucide X icon in emerald colour. Import from lucide-react and set size to 20px.

requirements.summary: Upgrade global colour palette to multi-accent system with forest greens as base and amber/gold, teal, emerald accents applied contextually throughout the UI
acceptanceCriteria: CSS custom properties include amber/gold, teal, and emerald tokens
Tailwind config exposes these as usable class names
Amber/gold accent appears on at least section headers or badges
Teal accent appears on secondary card borders or icon backgrounds
Emerald accent is used on active/interactive states
Forest green remains the dominant colour throughout

file_operations.description: Add CSS custom properties for multi-accent palette: --accent-amber (#c97d2a), --accent-amber-light (#e8a84a), --accent-teal (#1a6b5a), --accent-emerald (#4a9e6a). Update existing forest green tokens (#1a3a2a, #2d5a3d, #0f2419) to remain dominant. Ensure amber/gold, teal, and emerald are defined as contextual accent tokens.

Extend theme.colors to expose amber (c97d2a, e8a84a), teal (1a6b5a), and emerald (4a9e6a) as usable Tailwind class names (e.g., text-accent-amber, bg-accent-teal, border-accent-emerald). Keep forest green tokens as primary/base colours.

requirements.summary: Redesign all card components with premium mixed aesthetic: deep green-tinted glassmorphism, bold gradients, emerald rim border, generous padding, and clear typography hierarchy
acceptanceCriteria: All card types use deep green-tinted glassmorphism backgrounds
Cards have a visible emerald rim border at 1px
Internal padding is at least 20px
Typography hierarchy is clearly distinguishable: title > subtitle > body
Cards appear three-dimensional through layered box-shadows
18px border-radius is maintained on all cards

file_operations.description: Apply premium card styling to Quick Access tiles: backdrop-blur-md, background rgba(26,58,42,0.6), border-radius 18px, 1px border rgba(74,158,106,0.25), padding 24px. Add layered box-shadows (inner glow + outer drop shadow). Set title to 16–18px bold, metadata to 12–13px muted, body to 14px with line-height 1.6.

Apply premium card styling to meal cards: backdrop-blur-md, background rgba(26,58,42,0.6), border-radius 18px, 1px border rgba(74,158,106,0.25), padding 24px. Add layered box-shadows. Set meal name to 16–18px bold, timings to 12–13px muted, food items to 14px with line-height 1.6.

Apply premium card styling to event cards: backdrop-blur-md, background rgba(26,58,42,0.6), border-radius 18px, 1px border rgba(74,158,106,0.25), padding 24px. Add layered box-shadows. Set event title to 16–18px bold, date/location to 12–13px muted, description to 14px with line-height 1.6.

Apply premium card styling to notice cards: backdrop-blur-md, background rgba(26,58,42,0.6), border-radius 18px, 1px border rgba(74,158,106,0.25), padding 24px. Add layered box-shadows. Set notice title to 16–18px bold, date/category to 12–13px muted, body to 14px with line-height 1.6.

requirements.summary: Overhaul Hero section with dramatic premium aesthetic: multi-stop radial gradient, gradient text heading, premium badge, ambient glow orbs, and high-end typography
acceptanceCriteria: Hero heading uses a gradient text effect (emerald to amber)
Background uses a deep multi-stop radial gradient
A premium badge/pill subtitle is present below the heading
Heading is 56px+ on mobile screens
Ambient glow orbs are visible in the background at low opacity
Overall impression is dramatically more premium than before

file_operations.description: Replace existing background with deep multi-stop radial gradient (from #0f2419 center to #1a3a2a to #0a0f0b edges). Apply gradient text effect to 'unaIITM' heading (emerald #4a9e6a to amber #e8a84a) using background-clip: text. Add premium subtitle badge ('IIT Madras Campus Platform') with teal-tinted glassmorphism pill styling. Increase heading font-size to 56–64px on mobile with letter-spacing -0.02em. Add 2–3 subtle ambient glow orbs (green/teal/amber) at low opacity positioned decoratively in background.

requirements.summary: Upgrade Navbar to premium glassmorphism bar with deeper blur, emerald separator, gradient logo text, Lucide Menu icon, and hover-accented dropdown links
acceptanceCriteria: Navbar uses backdrop-blur(24px) and deep rgba background
Logo text has emerald-to-amber gradient effect
Hamburger is replaced with Lucide Menu icon in emerald
Dropdown nav links have left-side teal accent bars on hover
A subtle emerald bottom border is visible on the navbar

file_operations.description: Increase backdrop-blur to blur(24px), deepen background to rgba(15,36,25,0.85). Add 1px bottom border rgba(74,158,106,0.2). Apply gradient text effect (emerald to amber) to 'unaIITM' logo matching Hero heading. Replace hamburger with Lucide Menu icon in emerald (#4a9e6a). Style dropdown nav links with left-side teal accent bars on hover.

requirements.summary: Improve global spacing and typography hierarchy: larger section titles with gradient underlines, increased vertical padding, improved line-height, and premium letter-spacing
acceptanceCriteria: Section headings are 26px+ with a gradient or accent underline
Vertical section spacing is at least 64px
Global body line-height is 1.65 or greater
Headings use letter-spacing -0.01em
BottomPanel and Modal list items have 16px+ padding
Typography hierarchy is clearly distinguished throughout

file_operations.description: Increase title font-size to 26–30px bold. Add gradient underline or accent line using amber/teal palette. Set subtitle to 13–14px in muted off-white (#a8c4b0). Apply letter-spacing -0.01em to heading.

Set global body line-height to 1.65. Add utility classes for section spacing (py-16 = 64px vertical padding minimum). Ensure headings use letter-spacing -0.01em. Add margin-bottom utilities for generous section separation.
Increase top/bottom padding on all list items inside BottomPanel body to 16px minimum. Ensure consistent vertical rhythm and generous touch targets.
Increase top/bottom padding on all list items inside Modal body to 16px minimum. Ensure consistent vertical rhythm and generous touch targets.
Increase vertical padding between sections to at least 64px (py-16 or equivalent). Apply consistent spacing between Hero, QuickAccess, MessMenu, Events, Notices, and Footer.

requirements.summary: Redesign Mess Menu with distinct accent colours per meal (amber Breakfast, emerald Lunch, teal Dinner), Lucide icons in headers, styled food lists, and timings badges
acceptanceCriteria: Breakfast card header uses amber/gold accent
Lunch card header uses emerald accent
Dinner card header uses teal accent
Each card header includes a Lucide icon
Food items have subtle divider lines between them
Timings badge is present with accent-coloured background

file_operations.description: Apply distinct accent colours to meal card headers: amber/gold (#c97d2a, #e8a84a) for Breakfast, emerald (#4a9e6a) for Lunch, teal (#1a6b5a) for Dinner. Include Lucide icon (Coffee, UtensilsCrossed, Moon) in each header alongside meal name. Display food items as styled list with subtle 1px divider lines (rgba(74,158,106,0.15)). Add 'Timings' badge below meal title using accent colour as background at 20% opacity.

requirements.summary: Redesign Quick Access tiles with premium icon card style: gradient icon containers, Lucide icons, canopy-inspired pattern background, and enhanced BottomPanel headers
acceptanceCriteria: Each Quick Access tile has a gradient icon container circle
Lucide icon is centred in the icon container in white
Label text is 12px semi-bold below the icon
BottomPanel header includes the corresponding Lucide icon and gradient title
BottomPanel close button uses Lucide X icon in emerald
Row background has a subtle patterned overlay

file_operations.description: Redesign tiles to square/rounded-square format with 44px gradient icon container circle (green-to-teal or green-to-amber gradient background) centred at top. Place Lucide icon inside in white. Position label text below icon at 12px semi-bold. Add subtle canopy-inspired pattern to row background using CSS repeating gradients at low opacity. When BottomPanel opens, include the tile's Lucide icon in header alongside gradient accent title.

Enhance header to accept an optional icon prop (Lucide component). Display icon alongside title with gradient accent styling. Ensure close button uses Lucide X icon in emerald (already covered in REQ-13).
